name: Bandit!
description:
Made in two days for the ludum dare 48

Welcome bandit!

go deep in to the underground  bunkers to steal it all

remember the deeper you go, the greater the reward

good luck bandit.

tips:

  • play the tutorial before start the game
  • there area two levels in total
  • you can hide in the doors with E
  • touch the flag to end the level only if you have some money

music:

level theme: Good Mood by Dusty Wyver @wyver9

tutorial theme: Explorer by Ryan Burks
